verses.verse: Now <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> Abram's <S%H802>wife<s%> had <S%H3205>borne<s%> him <S%H3808>no<s%> [children,] and she had an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H8198>maid<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1904>Hagar.<s%>

So <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H4994>"Now<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6113>prevented<s%> me from <S%H3205>bearing<s%> <S%H1129>[children.<s%>] <S%H4994>Please<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> in to my <S%H8198>maid;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> I shall <S%H1129>obtain<s%> children <S%H4480>through<s%> her." And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai.<s%>

And <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H7093><s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> had <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> her <S%H8198>maid,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to her <S%H376>husband<s%> Abram as his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And he <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived;<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> her <S%H1404>mistress<s%> was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> "May the <S%H2555>wrong<s%> done me be upon you. I <S%H5414>gave<s%> my <S%H8198>maid<s%> into your <S%H2436>arms;<s%> but when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> I was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>sight.<s%> May the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and me."

But <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> your <S%H8198>maid<s%> is in your <S%H3027>power;<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to her <S%H2896>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>" So <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H6031>treated<s%> her <S%H6031>harshly,<s%> and she <S%H1272>fled<s%> from her <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

Now the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> her by a <S%H9407>spring<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> by the <S%H9407>spring<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1904>"Hagar,<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>'s <S%H8198>maid,<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> have you <S%H935>come<s%> from and <S%H575>where<s%> are you <S%H1980>going<s%>?" And she <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H1272>fleeing<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of my <S%H1404>mistress<s%> Sarai."
Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to your <S%H1404>mistress,<s%> and <S%H6031>submit<s%> yourself to her <S%H3027>authority.<s%>"

Moreover, the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "I will <S%H7235>greatly<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> so that they shall be <S%H3808>too<s%> <S%H7230>many<s%> to <S%H5608>count.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her further, <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> you are with <S%H2030>child,<s%> And you shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> And you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8085>given<s%> <S%H8085>heed<s%> to your <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>

"And he will be a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkey<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> [will be] against <S%H3605>everyone,<s%> And everyone's <S%H3027>hand<s%> [will be] against him; And he will <S%H7931>live<s%> to the <S%H6440>east<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>"

Then she <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to her, "Thou art a <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7210>who<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%>"; for she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Have I <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H7200>remained<s%> <S%H7200>alive<s%> <S%H1988>here<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7210>seeing<s%> Him?"
<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H875>well<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> Beer-lahai-roi; <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> and <S%H1260>Bered.<s%>

So <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> a <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> <S%H3205>bore,<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael.<s%>
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> was eighty-six <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> to him.
